name: Return the details of a SEPA Direct Debit with an incorrect OIN

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000935430811000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I search for for the details of the following SEPA Direct Debit:
| nsc | account | uniqueMandateReferenceNumber | sepaOIN |
| 931012 | 15507009 | 654654694 | IE52SDD300377 |

children.description: Get sepa direct debit details: 931012, 15507009, 654654694, IE52SDD300377

testSteps.description:
Then the following SEPA Direct Debit Details Error Response Header should be returned
| errorCode | errorString |
| 109 | There are no SEPA Direct Debit Records found |

userStory.storyName: View Details of a Direct Debit

title: Return the details of a SEPA Direct Debit with an incorrect OIN

tags.name: View Details of a Direct Debit
